InnoDB (MySQL) ê¸°ì¤€

-- 1. COUNT(*) - ê°€ì¥ ë¹ ë¦„

-- Secondary Index ì‚¬ìš©, ë°ì´í„° í˜ì´ì§€ ì ‘ê·¼ X

-- 2. COUNT(primary_key) - ë¹ ë¦„

ğŸ” COUNT(*) WHERE column_name IS NOT NULL vs COUNT(column_name)

SELECT COUNT(*) 
FROM orders 
WHERE email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT COUNT(email) 
FROM orders;
